name: umn_incent_users
xsql:
select u.name, u.email, 
case when u.enabled = '1' then 'Yes' else 'No' end as is_active,u.ip_addresses, u.locale, u.primary_role_type
from xactly.xc_user u
join xactly.xc_user_role ur 
on u.user_id = ur.user_id
join xactly.xc_role r
on r.role_id = ur.role_id
where (:v_searchField is NULL or u.name like '%' || :v_searchField || '%' or u.email like '%' || :v_searchField || '%')
AND (:v_role_name is NULL or r.name = :v_role_name)
AND (:v_enabled is NULL or u.enabled = :v_enabled)
group by u.email, u.name, u.enabled, u.ip_addresses, u.locale, u.primary_role_type
order by u.name
